text: Aspasia Papathanasiou (Greek; Ασπασία Παπαθανασίου, 20 October 1918 – 8 June 2020) was a Greek stage actress, director and writer. In 1991 she became an Officier of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres. She was born in Amfissa, Greece, in 1918. She worked at the Peiraiko Theatro. She went into exile. Aspasia Papathanasiou died on 8 June 2020. == References == Category:1918 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Greek actors
title: Aspasia Papathanasiou
